entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 70%
